title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1015.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1015.1 - Application

State Regulations

These rules apply to all attorneys who are admitted
to practice in, reside in, practice law in, or who have an office in the Fourth

Judicial Department, or who otherwise engage in conduct covered by these rules
within the Fourth Judicial Department, including an attorney admitted to
practice
pro hac vice
within the Fourth Judicial Department or
an attorney who in any way participates in an action or proceeding
therein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1015.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
